name: gpii-launcher
description: A launcher that merges options from the command line, environment, options files with the launcher defaults.

scripts.test: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover --report none --print none --include-pid tests/js/all-tests.js
scripts.posttest: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js report --root coverage --dir reports lcov text-summary

author: Tony Atkins <tony@raisingthefloor.org>
